title: 20 Minutes Lower Priority Queue wait??
body:
So, I waited my 20 minutes, and I enter queue, and I need to wait another 20 minutes?
It's not going away no matter what, I've waited 4 lots of 20 minutes now....RIot what's going on???

replies.body:
People who AFK could have just played a 2v2 map alas Magma Chamber as they only last 10 or so minutes but nope, Rest In Pepsi 2v2. 

Thanks Obama.

> [{quoted}](name=Rav,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yuJbyN9z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-13T12:56:42.477+0000)
> People who AFK could have just played a 2v2 map alas Magma Chamber as they only last 10 or so minutes but nope, Rest In Pepsi 2v2. 
> 
> Thanks Obamacare.

ftfy
I thought the fox song inspired leave buster improvement
Sometimes I get crazy queue wait times, generally if I ever wait more than 5 minutes I'll reset the client and it will fix the problem. its probably just a bug with the queue system.

> [{quoted}](name=PervySage79,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yuJbyN9z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-16T04:53:27.528+0000)
>
> Sometimes I get crazy queue wait times, generally if I ever wait more than 5 minutes I'll reset the client and it will fix the problem. its probably just a bug with the queue system.

It's not a queue wait time, it's a penalty wait time. After the penalty, then you get queue wait time.
Don't be a troll and don't be afk then.

> [{quoted}](name=Your Neighbour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yuJbyN9z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-12T23:59:34.166+0000)
> Don't be a troll and don't be afk then.

1 - Don’t say anything if you have nothing good to say man, I’m looking for a solution.
2 - My AFKing isn’t due to trolling but due to my limited time these days
if you seriously afk due to time constraints do not play this game, that's inconsiderate as %%%% and you deserve to wait 20 minutes, manage your time better.

> [{quoted}](name=Wiggy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yuJbyN9z,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-13T02:35:01.554+0000)
> if you seriously afk due to time constraints do not play this game, that's inconsiderate as %%%% and you deserve to wait 20 minutes, manage your time better.

I deserve to wait 20 minutes, but at the moment I've been waiting more than hours on end >_>

Plus that's why I'm only playing customs these days but I still want IP .__.
Send a support ticket. I think there was a bug thing a while back about people that kept having their priority que refreshing and never getting into games.

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yuJbyN9z,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2014-12-13T07:43:34.131+0000)
> Send a support ticket. I think there was a bug thing a while back about people that kept having their priority que refreshing and never getting into games.

Yeah, I sent it to them the same time I made this post. It's taking them a while~
I got one from the LoL Recorder Bug
Isn't it just riots new way to deal with toxic players? I swear i read about this awhile ago just search up oce tribunal or something and read about it. I don't have a solution for you though
